channel.title: Mark Eyking
channel.description: Recent news about Mark Eyking, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by TheChronicleHerald.ca
item.description:
Eyking slams 15% tariff to store foreign boats in NS
Enforcing a Canadian Border Services tariff on foreign-owned boats stored in Canadian boatyards and marinas over the winter will devastate the industry and create animosity, says MP Mark Eyking. “Boats are actually leaving Baddeck now and these are ...

item.title: Mentioned by Grainews
item.description:
Liberals name new ag critic in shadow-cabinet shuffle
Party leader Justin Trudeau on Wednesday shuffled his shadow cabinet, moving Mark Eyking, the MP for Sydney-Victoria since 2000, to the ag portfolio. Eyking replaces Guelph MP Frank Valeriote, who becomes deputy whip. Eyking, 52, and his wife Pam ...

item.title: Mentioned by Cape Breton Post
item.description:
Eyking new Liberal agriculture critic; Cuzner maintains role in employment and ...
SYDNEY — Sydney-Victoria MP Mark Eyking has been given new responsibilities in leader Justin Trudeau's Liberal shadow cabinet. Topics : Nova Scotia Agriculture College , Canada , Millville. Eyking will assume the critic role of agriculture and agri-food.

item.title: Mentioned by Sou'Wester
item.description:
'Why put this community through this torment?'
LAWRENCE, N.S. — Sydney-Victoria MP Mark Eyking says he'll ask the federal auditor general or ombudsman to look into how employment insurance investigations in the Bay St. Lawrence area were carried out. Almost 50 people attended a public meeting ...

item.title: Introduced legislation

Private member's bill C-624
